resources.string: Background image for the homepage screen

Rules:
1. Each player is assigned a corner at the beginning of the game.
2. Players take turns filling their tiles with one of 6 colors in an attempt to capture adjacent tiles of the same color.
3. You cannot change the color to yours or your opponent\'s.
4. The game ends when there are no tiles left to capture.


Goal:
The goal of the game is to capture more tiles than your opponent, then you win.
Background image for the help screen
Pick the number of colors in the game
Choose if you want time control
Background image for the configuration screen
Represents a choice of image for the user
Crown icon, indicating the user has won
Looser icon, indicating the user has lost
Two swords icon, indicating the user has drawn
